replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
java.lang.NullPointerException: Loading entity NBT
        at techguns.TGPermissions.isPlayerOp(TGPermissions.java:35)
        at techguns.TGPermissions.canUseUnsafeMode(TGPermissions.java:29)
        at techguns.capabilities.TGExtendedPlayer.loadFromNBT(TGExtendedPlayer.java:254)
        at techguns.capabilities.TGExtendedPlayerStorage.readNBT(TGExtendedPlayerStorage.java:22)
        at techguns.capabilities.TGExtendedPlayerStorage.readNBT(TGExtendedPlayerStorage.java:10)
        at techguns.capabilities.TGExtendedPlayerCapProvider.deserializeNBT(TGExtendedPlayerCapProvider.java:47)
        at net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.CapabilityDispatcher.deserializeNBT(CapabilityDispatcher.java:135)
        at net.minecraft.entity.Entity.func_70020_e(Entity.java:1852)

把Techguns.cfg配置文件里的force safemode for noneops设置为false试试，如果原来是false就改成true，或者前往curseforge发布页更新这个mod
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/techguns

    # Force non opped players to use safe mode, server side setting [default: false]
    B:ForceSafeModeForNonOps=false

如果找不到的话就更新一下mod
